28. Hofmann R, Steinwender C, Kammler J, et al. Effects of a high dose intravenous bolus amiodarone in patients with atrial fibrillation and a rapid ventricular rate. Int J Cardiol 2006;110:27-32.
query: beta-blockers rate control atrial fibrillation metoprolol propranolol heart rate ventricular response
title: New-onset atrial fibrillation in critically ill patients
reference: Sibley, S., & Muscedere, J. (2015). New-onset atrial fibrillation in critically ill patients. Canadian Respiratory Journal, 22(3), 179-182.
